1. What's the Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price today?

Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price was Rs 618.05 at 04:01 PM IST on 13th Aug 2024 . Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price was down by 4.47 % from the previous closing price of Rs 646.95 . Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price trend:

Last 1 Month: Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price moved down by 8.61 % on BSE

Last 3 Months: Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price moved down by 3.88 % on BSE

Last 12 Months: Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price moved down by 11.32 % on BSE

Last 3 Years: Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd price moved up by 257.04 % on BSE

The performance of the Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd stock can be quickly analysed on the following metrics:

The stock's PE is 24.66

3. What is the market cap of Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd ?

Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd has a market capitalisation of Rs 3,809 crore.

4. What is Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd 's 52-week high/low share price?

The Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd ’s 52-week high share price is Rs 825.85 and 52-week low share price is Rs 610.00 .

5. Is the Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd profitable?

On a consolidated basis, Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd reported a profit of Rs 37.59 crore on a total income of Rs 227.65 crore for the quarter ended 2024 . For the year ended Mar 2024 , Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd had posted a profit of Rs 37.85 crore on a total income of Rs 228.01 crore.

6. Which are Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd ’s peers in the Industrials sector?

Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd ’s top 5 peers in the Industrials sector are Vedant Fashions, Gokaldas Exports, Pearl Global Ind, Kewal Kir.Cloth., Dollar Industrie, Rupa & Co, Kitex Garments .
